tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE zoning_regulations (
  neighborhood_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  zoning_type VARCHAR(50),
  building_height INT,
  setback_distance INT,
  max_occupancy INT
);

CREATE TABLE regulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_description TEXT,
    category_id INT,
    neighborhood_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES zoning_categories(category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (neighborhood_id) REFERENCES neighborhoods(neighborhood_id)
);
